import {useState} from 'react' import {Card, TextField, Button } from '@mui/material' import './CallApi.css' const CallApi = () =>{ const [input, setInput] = useState('') const [data, setData] = useState('') const fetchApi = async () =>{ const url = `https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${input}&units=metric&appid=862b05f14f00d218712da3bba053bd10` const res = await fetch(url) const fetchdata = await res.json() setData(fetchdata.main) } return( <>

Live search weather App

setInput(e.target.value)} label='enter city name ' variant='outlined'/>

{!input ? 'no city choosen' : input}

{!data ? '___' : data.temp} deg.c

min-temp {!data ? '____' : data.temp_min}

||

max-temp {!data ? '____' : data.temp_max}

} ) } export default CallApi
